StatusItem.name: CreateSpecifiedInformationObjectWithValues_HttpFormData
StatusItem.description: Http POST data. Unprocessed and unfiltered.

StatusItem.name: CreateSpecifiedInformationObjectWithValues_CatchInvalidDomains
StatusItem.description: Catch and throw an exception for invalid domains (system reserved)

StatusItem.name: CreateSpecifiedInformationObjectWithValues_CreateInternalObjects
StatusItem.description: Create internal objects, whose values will be set after creation.

StatusItem.name: CreateSpecifiedInformationObjectWithValues_FieldValues
StatusItem.description: Filtered field value collection. Filter by non-prefix, add ID to keys. Reflect also to internal objects notation with ___ names texts.

StatusItem.name: CreateSpecifiedInformationObjectWithValues_ObjectLinkValues
StatusItem.description: Filtered object link value collection. Filter by Object_ prefix, add ID to keys.

StatusItem.name: CreateSpecifiedInformationObjectWithValues_BinaryContentFiles
StatusItem.description: Filtered binary content value collection. Filter by File_ prefix, add ID to keys.

StatusItem.name: CreateSpecifiedInformationObjectWithValues_SetFieldValues
StatusItem.description: Set field values of created object.

StatusItem.name: CreateSpecifiedInformationObjectWithValues_SetObjectLinks
StatusItem.description: Set object links of created object.

StatusItem.name: CreateSpecifiedInformationObjectWithValues_StoreInitialObject
StatusItem.description: Stores the created object first time - with set values.

StatusItem.name: CreateSpecifiedInformationObjectWithValues_SetBinaryContent
StatusItem.description: Sets binary content of created object.

StatusItem.name: CreateSpecifiedInformationObjectWithValues_StoreCompleteObject
StatusItem.description: Stores the created object - with all set values.

StatusItem.name: DeleteSpecifiedInformationObject_CatchInvalidDomains
StatusItem.description: Catch and throw an exception for invalid domains (system reserved)

StatusItem.name: SetDeviceMembershipValidationAndActiveStatus_SetDeviceValidAndActiveValue
StatusItem.description: Set device valid and active value

StatusItem.name: CreateAndSendEmailValidationForDeviceJoinConfirmation_OwningAccount
StatusItem.description: Security context owner - if an account

StatusItem.name: CreateAndSendEmailValidationForDeviceJoinConfirmation_OwningGroup
StatusItem.description: Security context owner - if a group

StatusItem.name: CreateAndSendEmailValidationForDeviceJoinConfirmation_OwnerEmailAddresses
StatusItem.description: Owner relevant email address(es). For group - the initiator's active group email, for account - all of accounts emails

StatusItem.name: CreateAndSendEmailValidationForDeviceJoinConfirmation_SendEmailConfirmation
StatusItem.description: Create and send email confirmation for joining the devices

StatusItem.name: CreateAuthenticatedAsActiveDevice_TargetBallHostName
StatusItem.description: Target Ball instance host name. If not given, using the same host that the call was made from.

StatusItem.name: CreateAuthenticatedAsActiveDevice_TargetGroupID
StatusItem.description: Target group ID to which the device membership is established

StatusItem.name: CreateAuthenticatedAsActiveDevice_SharedSecret
StatusItem.description: Shared secret with the back-end to establish connection

StatusItem.name: PerformNegotiationAndValidateAuthenticationAsActiveDevice_NegotiateWithTarget
StatusItem.description: Negotiate with target party. Set validation flag as true if succesfully negotiated.

StatusItem.name: CreateInformationOutput_AuthenticatedDeviceID
StatusItem.description: Authenticated device ID for this connection (optional)

StatusItem.name: SetInformationOutputValidationAndActiveStatus_InformationOutput
StatusItem.description: Information output of which to set the status

StatusItem.name: SetInformationOutputValidationAndActiveStatus_SetInputValidAndActiveValue
StatusItem.description: Set input valid and active value

StatusItem.name: CreateAndSendEmailValidationForInformationOutputConfirmation_OwningAccount
StatusItem.description: Security context owner - if an account

StatusItem.name: CreateAndSendEmailValidationForInformationOutputConfirmation_OwningGroup
StatusItem.description: Security context owner - if a group

StatusItem.name: CreateAndSendEmailValidationForInformationOutputConfirmation_OwnerEmailAddresses
StatusItem.description: Owner relevant email address(es). For group - the initiator's active group email, for account - all of accounts emails

StatusItem.name: CreateAndSendEmailValidationForInformationOutputConfirmation_SendEmailConfirmation
StatusItem.description: Create and send email confirmation for approving information output

StatusItem.name: PushToInformationOutput_InformationOutput
StatusItem.description: Information output to push the data to

StatusItem.name: PushToInformationOutput_VerifyValidOutput
StatusItem.description: Verify that output is valid and active

StatusItem.name: PushToInformationOutput_DestinationURL
StatusItem.description: Location to push the output to

StatusItem.name: PushToInformationOutput_LocalContentURL
StatusItem.description: Local content URL to push the output from

StatusItem.name: CreateInformationInput_AuthenticatedDeviceID
StatusItem.description: Authenticated device ID for this connection (optional)

StatusItem.name: SetInformationInputValidationAndActiveStatus_InformationInput
StatusItem.description: Information input of which to set the status

StatusItem.name: SetInformationInputValidationAndActiveStatus_SetInputValidAndActiveValue
StatusItem.description: Set input valid and active value

StatusItem.name: CreateAndSendEmailValidationForInformationInputConfirmation_OwningAccount
StatusItem.description: Security context owner - if an account

StatusItem.name: CreateAndSendEmailValidationForInformationInputConfirmation_OwningGroup
StatusItem.description: Security context owner - if a group

StatusItem.name: CreateAndSendEmailValidationForInformationInputConfirmation_OwnerEmailAddresses
StatusItem.description: Owner relevant email address(es). For group - the initiator's active group email, for account - all of accounts emails

StatusItem.name: CreateAndSendEmailValidationForInformationInputConfirmation_SendEmailConfirmation
StatusItem.description: Create and send email confirmation for joining the devices

StatusItem.name: FetchInputInformation_InformationInput
StatusItem.description: Information input to fetch the data for

StatusItem.name: FetchInputInformation_VerifyValidInput
StatusItem.description: Verify that input is valid and active

StatusItem.name: FetchInputInformation_InputFetchLocation
StatusItem.description: Location to fetch the input into

StatusItem.name: FetchInputInformation_InputFetchName
StatusItem.description: Name of item to store the fetched input - derived from local content name.

StatusItem.name: ProcessFetchedInputs_InformationInput
StatusItem.description: Information input to fetch the data for

StatusItem.name: ProcessFetchedInputs_VerifyValidInput
StatusItem.description: Verify that input is valid and active

StatusItem.name: ProcessFetchedInputs_InputFetchLocation
StatusItem.description: Location to fetch the input into

StatusItem.name: BeginAccountEmailAddressRegistration_AccountID
StatusItem.description: AccountID whose email is to be registered

StatusItem.name: BeginAccountEmailAddressRegistration_EmailAddress
StatusItem.description: Email address to add to account

StatusItem.name: BeginAccountEmailAddressRegistration_ValidateUnexistingEmail
StatusItem.description: Validate that the email to add is not already registered

StatusItem.name: BeginAccountEmailAddressRegistration_EmailValidation
StatusItem.description: Email validation object prepared ready to stored and to be sent

StatusItem.name: BeginAccountEmailAddressRegistration_SendEmailConfirmation
StatusItem.description: Create and send email confirmation for validating the email

StatusItem.name: UnregisterEmailAddress_AccountID
StatusItem.description: AccountID whose email is to be registered

StatusItem.name: UnregisterEmailAddress_EmailAddress
StatusItem.description: Email address to add to account

StatusItem.name: CreateGroupWithTemplates_TemplateNameList
StatusItem.description: Comma separated list of templates to initialize group at creation

StatusItem.name: CreateGroupWithTemplates_SetDefaultRedirect
StatusItem.description: Sets groups default redirect if given

StatusItem.name: CreateGroupWithTemplates_InitializeGroupWithDefaultObjects
StatusItem.description: Initialize group with default objects (hardcoded for now)

StatusItem.name: SetOwnerWebRedirect_Owner
StatusItem.description: Owner whose redirection is to be set

StatusItem.name: SetOwnerWebRedirect_RedirectPath
StatusItem.description: Redirect path, if null or empty, the redirection is to be removed.

StatusItem.name: SetOwnerWebRedirect_SetRedirection
StatusItem.description: Sets the redirection file for owner.

StatusItem.name: ProcessAllResourceUsagesToOwnerCollections_ProcessBatchSize
StatusItem.description: Batch size to process as a block.

StatusItem.name: ProcessAllResourceUsagesToOwnerCollections_ExecuteBatchProcessor
StatusItem.description: Execute batch processor with given batch size until there are less than batch size left

StatusItem.name: ProcessBatchOfResourceUsagesToOwnerCollections_ProcessBatchSize
StatusItem.description: Batch size to process as a block.

StatusItem.name: ProcessBatchOfResourceUsagesToOwnerCollections_ProcessIfLess
StatusItem.description: Process if less than requested size

StatusItem.name: ProcessBatchOfResourceUsagesToOwnerCollections_BatchToProcess
StatusItem.description: Retrieve block blob list to process - and acquire lock if possible. Null if doesn't match requirement or fail to acquire lock

StatusItem.name: ProcessBatchOfResourceUsagesToOwnerCollections_ProcessedFullCount
StatusItem.description: Did the operation have full batch size to process
